content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?
Um... this is Mabel. I think my kitchen sink is leaking pretty badly.
Thank you, Mabel. I'm sorry to hear about your leaking sink. Could you please provide your address so we can check our service availability for your location?
Oh, of course. Itâ€™s 1043 Maple Creek Drive, Apt 16B, Dresden. Do you have people who can come here?
Thank you for the address, Mabel. Let me confirm if your location is within our service area.

I'm sorry, Mabel, but it looks like your address is currently outside our service area. Unfortunately, we're unable to send a technician to your location at this time. Would you like a recommendation for a local plumber instead?
